channel.title: Updates on Deepen Saha
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Deepen Saha

item.title: Lean Thinking — What, Why, and How
item.description: A simple yet effective concept, you would think Lean Thinking would come to us naturally, but it doesn’t. To know more about this, read on.

item.title: Django Logging — A Weapon for Debuggers
item.description: Django logging configuration and usage for Beginners. In the simplest way printing out data into a file or console (terminal) making it easier for developers to trace back the source of errors.
